abstract: Rex W. Tillerson suggested a more accommodating position than the hard-nosed stance his company had held.
snippet: Rex W. Tillerson suggested a more accommodating position than the hard-nosed stance his company had held.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON, Feb. 13 — The chief executive of Exxon Mobil, Rex W. Tillerson, warned Tuesday that governments should not rush into policies that could damage the global economy in order to limit carbon emissions.

headline.main: Exxon Chief Cautions Against Rapid Action to Cut Carbon Emissions
headline.print_headline: Exxon Chief Cautions Against Rapid Action to Cut Carbon Emissions

byline.original: By Clifford Krauss and Jad Mouawad
